snippet: Art Spiegelman's long-standing influence on comics is being honored in Paris through May 21. The Bibliothèque Publique d'Information, within the Centre Pompidou, is exhibiting 400 works, selected by Spiegelman himself.
abstract: Art Spiegelman's long-standing influence on comics is being honored in Paris through May 21. The Bibliothèque Publique d'Information, within the Centre Pompidou, is exhibiting 400 works, selected by Spiegelman himself.

headline.main: In Paris, an Art Spiegelman Retrospective
